attributes.action: Deselect all MP's and remove the House of Lords from Westminster
attributes.additional_details:
Due to the total ineffectiveness of the current UK Government and Parliament
and the fact that they are actually ignoring the population of the United Kingdom.

These deselected MP's cannot reapply for selection in a new General Election.

The House of Lords should also be Abolished and removed from Westminster completely.
attributes.background:
I petition for all Members of parliament to be deselected from office.

The House of Lords should also be Abolished and removed from Westminster completely.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it is not something the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

The selection of parliamentary candidates is the responsibility of their political party.
